Name: Redfield Renegades
Details: Formed from the remains of the Redfield planetary militia after the Capellan Confederation captured the planet in 2760, the Renegades have gone on to work for the Lyran Commonwealth, the Free Worlds League, their former enemies in the Confederation and currently operate under the aegis of the Terran Hegemony.  The Renegades consist of a regiment of BattleMechs, mostly mediums with a some heavies and a few assaults.
